response.overview: The story of the most famous vegan in Israel, following her transition from an anonymous pamphlet distributer to the vegan movement leadership. Tal's life changes overnight when she meets Tsvi, a neurotic, reclusive man who dreams of a vegan revolution. He is the visionary who uses Tal as his charismatic, operational extension. Violent events and arrests become their driving force. Each provocation brings her closer to the heart of the mainstream and public awareness. But everything has a price. The more her struggle progresses, the more she becomes extreme in her views, and alienates those closest to her.
response.tagline: To change the world she had to change herself
response.title: One Angry Vegan
